In England, in the seven days to 04 December, there were 283,586 new confirmed cases (501.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 November, there were 248,733 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 14% (34,853 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 December is 9,043,108 (15,991.3 cases per 100,000 population).
